info.name: KostMan API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for KostMan (Kos Management System) including Authentication, Properties, Rooms, Tenants, Meter Readings, Bills, and Settings

item.name: Auth
item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and profile

request.description: Register a new user account
Login with email and password. Returns auth token that is automatically saved to collection variables.
Get current authenticated user information
Logout current user and invalidate token
Get all properties owned by the authenticated user

request.description: Update an existing property
Delete a property (only if no rooms exist)
Get all rooms for a specific property
Create a new room. Status can be: available, occupied, maintenance
Get detailed information about a specific room
Update room details including tenant assignment and move-in date
Delete a room
Get all tenants
Create a new tenant. ID Card Number must be exactly 16 digits. Status can be: active, inactive
Get detailed information about a specific tenant
Update tenant information
Delete a tenant

item.name: Meter Readings
item.description: CRUD operations for electricity meter readings

query.description: Filter meter readings by room ID

request.description: Get all meter readings for a specific room
Record a new meter reading. Period format: YYYY-MM. MeterEnd must be >= MeterStart
Get detailed information about a specific meter reading
Update meter reading values (partial update)
Delete a meter reading (only owner and user who recorded it can delete)

item.name: Bills
item.description: Bill generation and payment management with multi-month support

request.description: Get all bills with optional filters (roomId, isPaid, period)
Generate a bill for a single month. Supports proration if moveInDate is mid-month.
Generate a bill for multiple months (e.g., 3 months payment). Room price, water, and trash fees are multiplied by monthsCovered.
Mark a bill as paid. Sets isPaid to true and records paidAt timestamp.
Delete a bill

item.name: Settings
item.description: Global settings and integration settings management

request.description: Get global settings for the current user (creates default if not exists)
Update global settings (all fields are optional)
Get all integration settings (server keys are hidden for security)
Update or create integration settings for a specific provider. Server key is encrypted before storage.
Get all users (admin only)

variable.description: UUID of a property (set after creating a property)
UUID of a room (set after creating a room)
UUID of a tenant (set after creating a tenant)
UUID of a meter reading (set after creating a meter reading)
UUID of a bill (set after generating a bill)
